identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' aesthetic that feels precise, professional, and slightly futuristic. Avoid generic SaaS flatness.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Linear' precision with 'Spotify' moodiness.
Content is King: The 'Next Event' is the hero. Spotlight it.
Zoom In: Use drawers and slide-overs instead of page navigation to maintain context.
Negative Space: Don't cram the dashboard. Let the data breathe.

typography.instructions: Import 'Manrope' from Google Fonts. Use it for all Headings (h1-h4). Use 'Inter' for body text. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for dates, IDs, and technical data.

colors.mode_strategy: Dark Mode First (The 'Pro' View), Light Mode as 'Swiss' variant.
usage_rules: Primary color is for ACTIONS only (Buttons, Active States).
Status colors (Green/Amber/Red) must be used for Event Status and Email Status.
Use 'muted-foreground' for secondary text to reduce visual noise.

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. gap-6 for grids.
layout.navigation: Sidebar (Left) for Desktop, Bottom Bar or Hamburger for Mobile. Collapsible sidebar is preferred.

buttons.style: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

inputs.style: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

dialogs.style: rounded-xl border border-border bg-background shadow-lg sm:max-w-lg

custom_components.name: EventCard
custom_components.description: A large, visual card for the 'Next Event'. Includes a countdown timer, large title, and 'Manage' button.

custom_components.name: StatusBadge
custom_components.description: Pill-shaped badge for Event/Email status. Green=Sent, Amber=Pending, Red=Failed, Gray=Draft.

custom_components.name: TimelineView
custom_components.description: A vertical list of events sorted by date, with a connecting line (visual timeline).

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid and legible.
Do NOT use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Use 'Sheet' (Side Drawer) for creating/editing events to keep context.
Dark mode is the default preference, but Light mode must be perfectly accessible.
For the 'History' page, use a dense table layout (Control Room style).
Login page should use the 'login_bg' image as a side panel or background overlay.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a professional Event Management Dashboard. Focus on the 'Control Room' aesthetic. The user wants a dark theme preference. Use the provided colors and fonts strictly. Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the dashboard. Use 'Sheet' components for forms to avoid page reloads. Ensure the 'Next Event' is the visual hero of the dashboard.
